member.name: T:AdvancedInspector.AdvancedInspectorControl
member.summary: A collection of static method made to handle the drawing of the Advanced Inspector. In most cases, you won't have to deal with this class.

member.name: T:AdvancedInspector.IModal
member.summary: This EditorWindow can recieve and send Toolbox inputs.

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.IModal.ModalRequest(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Called when the Toolbox shortcut is pressed. The implementation should call CreateToolbox if the condition are right.

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.IModal.ModalClosed(AdvancedInspector.ModalWindow)
member.summary: Called when the associated toolbox is closed. Only called when Ok/Cancel or Enter/Escape is pressed. There's no reliable way of trapping the "click outside the popup" event.

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.AdvancedInspectorControl.ModalRequest(System.Boolean)
member.summary: IModal Implementation.

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.AdvancedInspectorControl.ModalClosed(AdvancedInspector.ModalWindow)
member.summary: IModal Implementation.

member.summary: Called by an Editor to have a collection of InspectorField to be displayed. Uniformized entry point of inspector drawing.

member.summary: Called by an Editor to have a collection of InspectorField to be displayed. Uniformized entry point of inspector drawing.

member.summary: Entry point of the inspection of a Property based editor.

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.AdvancedInspectorControl.InitList(AdvancedInspector.InspectorField)
member.summary: Unity doesn't always properly init it's array/list if a serialization reload didn't occur.

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.AdvancedInspectorControl.DrawExpander(AdvancedInspector.InspectorField,AdvancedInspector.FieldEditor,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Draw the arrow icon that allow to browse sub-object property.

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.AdvancedInspectorControl.DrawIndexedControl(AdvancedInspector.InspectorField)

member.summary: Draw the - button for a Dictionary

member.summary: Draw the + icon of a List

member.summary: Draw the + icon of a Dictionary

member.summary: Width of the label part.

member.summary: Used for internal callback from a modal windows.

member.summary: Field sorting enum.

member.name: T:AdvancedInspector.FieldEditor
member.summary: When a specific type is encounter by the Inspector, we check if someone defined an field editor for it. When it occurs, all the field drawing is left to the custom editor.

member.name: F:AdvancedInspector.FieldEditor.MIN_FIELD_HEIGHT
member.summary: Minimum field height

member.name: F:AdvancedInspector.FieldEditor.BUTTON_HEIGHT
member.summary: Button Height

member.name: F:AdvancedInspector.FieldEditor.VECTOR_FIELD_WIDTH
member.summary: Standard float-in-vector label width

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.FieldEditor.Draw(AdvancedInspector.InspectorField,UnityEngine.GUIStyle)
member.summary: The draw call from the Inspector.

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.FieldEditor.OnLabelDraw(AdvancedInspector.InspectorField,UnityEngine.Rect)
member.summary: Called after the label is drawn. Useful to add dragging modifier.

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.FieldEditor.OnLabelClick(AdvancedInspector.InspectorField)
member.summary: Event raised when someone click a label.

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.FieldEditor.OnLabelDoubleClick(AdvancedInspector.InspectorField)
member.summary: Event raised when someone double click a label.

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.FieldEditor.OnLabelDragged(AdvancedInspector.InspectorField)
member.summary: Fired when someone click and drag the label with modified key (control/shift/alt) pressed. A normal drag performs a copy/paste.

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.FieldEditor.OnContextualClick(AdvancedInspector.InspectorField,UnityEditor.GenericMenu)
member.summary: Event raised when someone right-click a label. The GenenicMenu is empty and can add new items in it.

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.FieldEditor.GetValue(AdvancedInspector.InspectorField)
member.summary: Get the value of a field. Flag "Show Mixed Value" automaticly and return null if a multi-selection has different values.

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.FieldEditor.Expandable
member.summary: Override if you want to prevent a type from being expandable at any time. Override the Expandable attributes.

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.FieldEditor.EditDerived
member.summary: If true and no fieldeditor is found for a specific type, this fieldeditor is used for the derived type.

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.FieldEditor.EditedTypes
member.summary: List of type this FieldEditor edit.

member.name: T:AdvancedInspector.InspectorEditor
member.summary: Base class of BehaviourEditor, ScriptableEditor and ExternalEditor.

member.summary: Preview is handled internally and is turned on and off using IPreview interface.

member.name: F:AdvancedInspector.InspectorEditor.parent
member.summary: In case of value type, we need to know the parent.

member.name: F:AdvancedInspector.InspectorEditor.fields
member.summary: List of fields held by this inspector.

member.name: F:AdvancedInspector.InspectorEditor.refresh
member.summary: When a value changed internally, this forces the fields to be refreshed.

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.InspectorEditor.OnEnable
member.summary: Unity's OnEnable.

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.InspectorEditor.OnDisable
member.summary: Unity's OnDisable

member.summary: Start the Scene View picking tool. Type can define the component we seek on a GameObject.

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.InspectorEditor.StopPicking
member.summary: Stop the picking tool before it has resolved.

member.summary: Preview Draw

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.InspectorEditor.OnSceneGUI
member.summary: Override this method if you want to draw on the scene view. Don't forget to call the base.

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.InspectorEditor.OnPreviewSettings
member.summary: Preview Settings

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.InspectorEditor.DataChanged
member.summary: Data Changed, repaint.

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.InspectorEditor.UseDefaultMargins
member.summary: Unity's Default Margins. False if running in Advanced Inspector.

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.InspectorEditor.OnInspectorGUI
member.summary: Default Inspector entry point.

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.InspectorEditor.DrawAdvancedInspector
member.summary: Similar to "DrawDefaultInspector", except this is the Advanced one.

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.InspectorEditor.RefreshFields
member.summary: Force this field to rebuild the list of its children. If you implement an editor specific to a type, you should only need to override this method. Consider clearing existing fields before adding new one.

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorEditor.Picking
member.summary: Is the Inspector currently in picking mode?

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorEditor.Advanced
member.summary: Return true if this editor is using advanced features.

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorEditor.Instances
member.summary: We use our own targets list because we can draw object not deriving from UnityEngine.Object.

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorEditor.Fields
member.summary: List of fields held by this inspector.

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorEditor.Expandable
member.summary: Override this if you implement your own inspector and doesn't want it to be expandable.

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorEditor.TestForDefaultInspector
member.summary: If true, will test if the type of in the inspector object has "AdvancedInspector" attributes. Default; false;

member.summary: Behaviour Editor is the entry point for all MonoBehaviour in Advanced Inspector.

member.summary: Unity's OnEnable.

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.BehaviourEditor.TestForDefaultInspector
member.summary: Should we check for the [AdvancedInspectorAttribute]?

member.name: T:AdvancedInspector.ExternalEditor
member.summary: Similar to a standard PropertyInspector, but can be called from outside the scope of a Inspector. Useful to build your own EditorWindow with an integrated inspector. Call the method Draw with a Rect of the region to draw on.

member.name: T:AdvancedInspector.IControl
member.summary: Define a control that can be drawn in an EditorWindow.

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.IControl.Draw(UnityEngine.Rect)
member.summary: Draw the control. Return if the parent EditorWindow should repaint the window.

member.name: E:AdvancedInspector.IControl.RequestRepaint
member.summary: In the event an internal process of the Control want a repaint of the window outside the Drawing scope.

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.ExternalEditor.Draw(UnityEngine.Rect)
member.summary: IControl implementation

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.ExternalEditor.Expandable
member.summary: If false, the Inspector won't draw the expander and won't reserve space on the left of the labels.

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.ExternalEditor.DraggableSeparator
member.summary: Can the separator be dragged around?

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.ExternalEditor.DivisionSeparator
member.summary: Where is the separator? In PerPixel, the value is in pixel from the top or the left. Otherwise, it's in %.

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.Watch
member.summary: Add this field to the watch list, which is displayed on the Watch window.

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.Select
member.summary: Force the selection of the serialized instances of this field.

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.Save
member.summary: Attempt to save this field value in play mode the next time it is stopped.

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.Apply
member.summary: Apply this field modification to its prefab parent.

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.Revert
member.summary: Revert any modification of this field and retreived the original value of its prefab parent.

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.RecordObjects(System.String)
member.summary: Record the object state for undo purpose.

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.Copy
member.summary: Copy the current value of this field to the clipboard.

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.CanPaste(System.Object)
member.summary: Return true if the passed value can be copied over this field.

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.Paste
member.summary: Paste the clipboard data to this field. Careful, you should do a type test before.

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.GetValue
member.summary: The current value of this field. If not a field, returns null. If multi object, return null if all the value aren't the same.

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.GetValue``1
member.summary: The current value of this field. If not a field, returns null. If multi object, return null if all the value aren't the same.

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.GetValue(System.Object)
member.summary: The value of this field, based on a specific object instance.

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.GetValue``1(System.Object)
member.summary: The value of this field, based on a specific object instance.

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.GetValues
member.summary: Get all instances value.

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.GetValues``1
member.summary: Get all instances value.

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.ResetToDefault
member.summary: Reset this field to its default value. Object = null Value Type = default(T)

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.SetValue(System.Object)
member.summary: Set the value of this field. Support undo. When calling this, assume undo will be "Set Value MyField"

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.SetValue(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Set the value of this field, based on a specific object instance. Does not support undo, should be recorded before calling.

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.SetDirty
member.summary: Flags the related serialized instance as dirty.

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.RefreshFields
member.summary: Reparse the internal sub-fields of this field. Useful when a list or an object changed.

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.SortFields
member.summary: Sort all children fields.

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.GetInfoByPath(UnityEngine.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Get a MemberInfo from a serializable path. The "Path" property from a InspectorField is a valid path.

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.GetValueByPath(UnityEngine.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Get a value from a serializable path. The "Path" property from a InspectorField is a valid path.

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.SetValueByPath(UnityEngine.Object,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Set a value by a serializable path. The "Path" property from a InspectorField is a valid path.

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.GetIndexedProperties(AdvancedInspector.InspectorField,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Collections.IList})
member.summary: Return a list of indexed field. Work with List and Array.

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.GetKeyedProperties(AdvancedInspector.InspectorField,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Collections.IDictionary})
member.summary: Return a list of keyed field. Work with IDictionary.

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.GetMembers(AdvancedInspector.InspectorField,System.Object[])
member.summary: Get fields from an object.

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.GetMembers(AdvancedInspector.InspectorField,System.Object[],System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get fields from an object.

member.name: M:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.GetMembers(AdvancedInspector.InspectorField,System.Object[],System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get fields from an object. Bypass ignore Inspect and Expandable attributes.

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.Instances
member.summary: The object owning this specific field.

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.SerializedInstances
member.summary: The serialized object owning this specific field. May not be the same as the instance, or even the currently Selected item in the Inspector.

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.Prefab
member.summary: The prefab parent to this object.

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.Info
member.summary: The member info of this field. PropertyInfo, FieldInfo or MethodInfo. Otherwise null.

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.Attributes
member.summary: The attributes of this field, manually and by reflection.

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.SerializedProperty
member.summary: Used only for the Script object reference at the top, or hidden Unity property.

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.GameObjects
member.summary: Get the parents GameObjects in cases of components. Useful for undoes.

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.Parent
member.summary: The parent field in case of nesting. Null if directly at the top.

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.Fields
member.summary: Subfields, such as field in an expandable object, or a list.

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.InternalFields
member.summary: Fields used for edition, are not drawn by the Inspector automaticly.

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.Depth
member.summary: Indentation depth of this field.

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.InspectorType
member.summary: Is this field a method, field, property or a group?

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.Undoable
member.summary: External editor are sometimes used to browse non-Unity object. Sadly, undo only works on valid Unity objects. Also return false if one of the serializable parent became null or none.

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.Type
member.summary: The type of this field. In most case, would return the FieldInfo.FieldType or PropertyInfo.PropertyType In case of a group, it returns null. If this field is flagged as Runtime-Resolved, it returns the type of the current value.

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.BaseType
member.summary: In case of a collection, returns the base type. Ex.: int[] or List(int), base type if int. In a dictionary, return the value type.

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.KeyType
member.summary: In case of a dictionary, returns the key type. Return null otherwise.

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.Inspect
member.summary: The Inspect Attribute that made this field visible.

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.Editor
member.summary: The Override Editor assigned to this field. No field can be drawn without one.

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.Restrictor
member.summary: A restrictor turns any field into a drop down list of specific choices.

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.Group
member.summary: Is this field part of a group?

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.Toolbar
member.summary: Is this field part of a toolbar?

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.Tab
member.summary: Is this field visibility controlled by a tab?

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.SelectedTab
member.summary: In cases of tabs, this is the currently selected tab enum value.

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.Descriptor
member.summary: The Descriptor assigned to this field. Name, tooltip, icon, etc. In case of multi-objects, there is no runtime invokation and the descriptor returned is the one on the member.

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.Static
member.summary: Returns true if the item inspected is static.

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.ReadOnly
member.summary: Readonly field cannot be edited. In case of multi-objects, if any is readonly, all are.

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.Help
member.summary: The Help data being drawn after the field. Does not work in multi-object edition.

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.Bypass
member.summary: This field is a bypass field, and sub-field automaticly recieve that flag.

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.Expandable
member.summary: Can this field be expanded? It display the arrow button.

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.Expanded
member.summary: Is this field open and displaying internal fields?

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.Erased
member.summary: Was this field erased?

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.DisplayAsParent
member.summary: Is this object display as being part of the parent?

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.CreateDerived
member.summary: Can this object field display the "+" sign to create a derived object from the base type?

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.Name
member.summary: Name of the label of that field. Can be modified by Descriptor.

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.FieldColor
member.summary: The color of the editable field.

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.BackgroundColor
member.summary: The color of the background (ex.: Expandable box)

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.Priority
member.summary: Priority of a field, used when sorting.

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.Order
member.summary: The order at which this field was found in the code. If an indexed field, return the index.

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.Label
member.summary: If false, this field does not draw its label. Useful for toolbar.

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.Style
member.summary: The specific style this field is draw with.

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.Path
member.summary: Internal path to this specific field. Used to keep persistant data across selection.

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.Hidden
member.summary: Many thing can prevent a field from being drawn. Ex.: InspectAttribute can hide it. If internal data from Unity return an exception on read, we skip it.

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.Editable
member.summary: Return false is any of the serialized parent have the hide flag "Not Editable".

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.Modified
member.summary: Return true if the item is different from it's prefab parent. Always return false if it's a non-value type and not a ref (UnityEngine.Object).

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.Mixed
member.summary: Return true when editing multiple object that doesn't have the same value. Always return true if they are objects and not the same instance.

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.Similar
member.summary: Return true if all instances are of the same type. Which mean they are expandable even in multi-objects edition

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.Index
member.summary: Index of the field in a list or array. Return -1 if not part of a collection.

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.IsList
member.summary: Is this a collection? (array or list)

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.Key
member.summary: When in a dictionary, the key of this value.

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.IsDictionary
member.summary: Is this a dictionary? (UDictionary)

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.Count
member.summary: Returns the current number of children. In case of list, returns the number of items in it. In case of multiples list, return -1 if all list doesn't have the same number of items.

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorField.OverloadToString
member.summary: Test if the current type overload ToString properly.

member.name: T:AdvancedInspector.InspectorType
member.summary: Type of InspectorField.

member.name: F:AdvancedInspector.InspectorType.None
member.summary: Empty unset field

member.name: F:AdvancedInspector.InspectorType.Field
member.summary: Field containing a FieldInfo

member.name: F:AdvancedInspector.InspectorType.Property
member.summary: Field containing a PropertyInfo

member.name: F:AdvancedInspector.InspectorType.Method
member.summary: Field containing a MethodInfo

member.name: F:AdvancedInspector.InspectorType.Serialized
member.summary: The InspectorField is only a wrapper around a SerializedProperty object. To use in case of hidden property in the Unity API.

member.name: F:AdvancedInspector.InspectorType.Group
member.summary: Field that is a group of other field.

member.name: F:AdvancedInspector.InspectorType.Toolbar
member.summary: Field that is drawn as a toolbar. (horizontal group)

member.name: F:AdvancedInspector.InspectorType.Unlinked
member.summary: Unlinked field just stores a value internally and is not bound to an object.

member.name: F:AdvancedInspector.InspectorType.Script
member.summary: The top field, the reference towards the original script.

member.name: P:AdvancedInspector.InspectorPreferences.Contextual

member.name: T:Clipboard
member.summary: A copy/paste buffer. Does not use the System buffer, as it's limited to a string and Unity does not provide a uniformed string serialization.

member.name: M:Clipboard.CreateInstance(System.Type)
member.summary: Create an instance of type Works with values, list, array, scriptableObject, string Components are ignored.

member.name: M:Clipboard.CreateInstance(UnityEngine.MonoBehaviour,System.Type)
member.summary:
Create an instance of type Works with values, list, array, scriptableObject, string Components are ignored.
The owner MonoBeahviour is used in case of the creation of a ComponentMonoBehaviour for its internal binding.

member.name: M:Clipboard.Copy(System.Object)
member.summary: Perform a deep copy if an object. Does not perform copies of Components or GameObject Values are returned as is (ex.: 14) strings are cloned. List/Array are enumerated and copied. Everything else is deep copied by fields.

member.name: M:Clipboard.TryConvertion(System.Type,System.Object@)
member.summary: Test if the current clipboard data can be converted into a specific type. Ex.: int to string

member.name: M:Clipboard.TryConvertion``1(``0@)
member.summary: Test if the current clipboard data can be converted into a specific type. Ex.: int to string

member.name: M:Clipboard.CanConvert(System.Type,System.Object)
member.summary: Return true if an object is convertable to a type.

member.name: P:Clipboard.Data
member.summary: In case of any normal object, returns deep copy of that object. In case of a Component, returns the original so you can apply it on a GameObject yourself (sorry) In case of a UnityEngine.Object, create a new one and perforce a Serialization Copy.

member.name: P:Clipboard.Type
member.summary: Type of the current data in the clipboard.

member.name: T:Separator
member.summary: A separator holds two control side by side and divide them with a draggable line. It can be horizontal or vertical.

member.name: M:Separator.Draw(UnityEngine.Rect)
member.summary: Draw the whole region holding the two control and the separator. The separator pass down the proper region to Draw of the sub-controls. Returns true if the window needs to be repainted.

member.summary: Targeted object

member.summary: Is on top of the target

member.summary: Selecttion dragged
